metadata.title: CVE-2017-7780 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 54. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort thatsome of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 55.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7780` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
